Package address

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
address.Menu
public class Menu extends Object
Since:
1.2 purpose: This class is used to provide prompt to the user to create enter in data to an AddressEntry
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sterling Jeppson

    • prompt_Zip

      public static int prompt_Zip()
      Prompts the user for a zip code. If the user does not enter an int then they are given an error message and re-prompted until an int is entered
      Returns:
      an int which represents persons zip in an AddressEntry

    • prompt_Telephone

      public static String prompt_Telephone()
      Prompts the user for a phone number and returns the string which they enter
      Returns:
      a String which represents persons PhoneNumber in an AddressEntry

    • prompt_Email

      public static String prompt_Email()
      Prompts the user for an email address and returns the string which they enter
      Returns:
      a String which represents persons email in an AddressEntry

    • promptForNewAddressEntry

      public static AddressEntry promptForNewAddressEntry()
      Instantiates and returns a new AddressEntry with values that are specified by the user with calls to all of the prompt methods
      Returns:
      an AddressEntry which contains information specified by user

    • display_Menu

      public static void display_Menu()
      Prints out a menu which prompts user for selection of operation to be performed on AddressBook
